title: Diamond Players are not good.  In fact, they're bad.
body:
I keep running into "Diamond Smurfs" in Silver - Gold.  

They can't carry.  They rage, they blame everyone, they feed their lane.  

They hide behind the excuse of "lol I'm not trying noob" but then why are they so mad.  

These Diamond Players are trash.  What am I even working toward?
